Name: Underworld Re: Card
About the game: Japanese Anime Style X Roguelike Deck-building CCG Reborn into Underworld As A Hero! 'Underworld Re: Card' is a game that combines deck-building and Rogue-like elements. Players are reborn into various races to fight and explore in the fantasy world. The game refers to the of Slay the Spire and Hearthstone adventure mode, but the difference from the same type of deck-building game is that the difficulty of the game is more similar to the Japanese anime's other world reborn, which belongs to the refreshing feeling of hero, players can easily build a deck with a one-turn-kill experience to challenge all kinds of bosses without losing the challenge. Secondly, the game has summon pet and partner system. It is no longer a lonely tower climbing experience, but a noisy and laughing life in a lively harem. When encountering a blessing, you can also use the diamonds inherited from multiple reincarnations to change your choices, or even choose all of them. The current game is still in the development stage. At present, the game has the following contents: A human brave hero. More than 120 available cards. 10 different combat encounters. In future versions, we plan to release the following new content: Goblin hero, Elf hero, Dwarf hero. The character class deck for mages and thieves. The summoning system is implemented. More unique cards available. The experience value and level system are implemented. More combat encounters.
